source_objects.title: Religion & Spirituality
source_objects.description: Learn about new religions, understand your spirituality, and much more.

items.title: Parapsychology Mini Lecture: Night Hag & Sleep Paralysis
items.headline: Learn about the phenomena of Night Hag; a frightening sleep disturbance estimated within 10 to 40% of people.
objectives_summary: Know some of the history and myths of the Night Hag
Identify the features of a Night Hag experience: Paralysis, Terror, & Hallucination
Know about medical explanations for Night Hag: Sleep Paralysis

items.title: Zen Christian Meditation Retreat
items.headline: Contemplative exercises and Buddhist insights for a deeper Christian spirituality.
objectives_summary: Explore contemplative practices
Discover intersections between Christian and Buddhist spirituality
Increase awareness of your divine nature

items.title: Introduction to Mahabharata
items.headline: Lessons on Life and Businesses
objectives_summary: understand the general story of Mahabharata
learn about the major characters in the story and the lessons and symbolisms they represent
learn about the great war of Kurukhsetra and the applicable and surprisingly modern strategies used in the war

items.title: Certified Aaiyyanist Healers Course
items.headline: Become an Acharya Level Aaiyyanist Healer
objectives_summary: Become a Certified Aaiyyanist Healer
Aaiyyanism
Dravidian Healing

items.title: Balance Your Masculine & Feminine: Awaken Your Inner Warrior
items.headline: Your Spiritual Journey to Wholeness and Unification Within...
objectives_summary: You will have deeper understanding of yourself and how your express yourself in the world.
They will have a greater understanding of thier Masculine and Feminine aspect in order to become into Union with themselves
They will be able to embrace unconditional love of themselves and their counterpart.

items.title: Angel; Guardian Angel; Connect With Your Guardian Angel
items.headline: Angel; Receive Spiritual Healing, Answers, And Advice From Angels
objectives_summary: Learn to Call On Your Guardian Angel
Unlock The Secret To Angel Communication
Learn To Claim Spiritual Assistance

items.title: The Key To 5D: A Spiritual Awakening Course
items.headline: Level 1 - Personal Ascension
objectives_summary: Spiritual awakening
True happiness
Inner peace

items.title: 203  -  Hinduism and Buddhism
items.headline: How do these religions compare and contrast to Christianity
objectives_summary: Understand the basic principles of Hinduism
Understand the History of Buddhism
Understand the differences between Christianity and Buddhism and Hinduism

items.title: Mystical Qabalah : Meditations On Ascending The Tree Of Life

visible_instructors.name: Mark
visible_instructors.title: Mark Keane
visible_instructors.job_title: World-Renowned Kundalini Yoga and Kundalini Dance Teacher

items.headline: AKA Kabbalah & Cabala : Explore The 10 Sephiroth Of The Divine Matrix To Know Your Soul's Purpose In The Universe
objectives_summary: Learn how to ascend the Qabalistic Tree of Life
Learn in detail what each of the 10 Sephiroth on the tree represent
Learn how to go on inner journeys into the psyche via meditation

items.title: Most Powerful Ancient SunMeditation Certification+ MP3 Audio
items.headline: Take Your Spiritual Practice To Next Level
objectives_summary: Receive a custom Meditation Guide Certificate upon completion!
Learn one of the most ancient Indian meditative technique taken from 5000 years old text Bhavishye Puran.
Just 7 minutes of the practice of this meditation keeps your energetic, dynamic and positive whole day.

items.title: Personal Transformation

visible_instructors.name: Wayne
visible_instructors.title: Wayne Back
visible_instructors.job_title: My courses will help you to bring the Kingdom of Heaven

items.headline: Understanding and implementing the five processes of personal transformation
objectives_summary: How to implement five personal transformation processes
How to understand and follow the Lord's vision for your life
The four key elements of drawing near to God

items.title: Angel Creations -Creating your Own Angelic Products
items.headline: How to Make Angelic Baths Salts and Sprays
objectives_summary: Student's will learn how to make a range of Angelic Bath salts and Angel's sprays that they can use in their practice and they will be able to create their own range of Angelic Products for resale

items.title: Working with Spirit Animals through Celtic & Inca Shamanism
items.headline: Light up and empower your life & awake the senses, through working with the shining Power Animal Spirits (Certified)
objectives_summary: How to work with animal spirits guides in two powerful Shamanic Traditions
How animals appear in old Celtic Myths and how they interact with Celtic Deities
Powerful Celtic Practices to connect you with your Animal Spirit Guides

items.headline: Learn about the Religions of India, China, and Japan from a University Professor
objectives_summary: Informed appreciation and understanding of Hinduism, Jainism, Buddhism, Daoism, Confucianism, and Shinto

items.title: Learning the Bible 101:  Benefits, Methods and Hindrances
items.headline: Learn how to get started reading, learning, studying and even teaching the bible
objectives_summary: have a different perspective of what the bible is
understand the benefits of learning the bible
have an eagerness and desire to learn the bible
